DataUnit¶

class troy.DataUnit(id)¶

DataUnit.

This is the object that is returned by troy.Troy or an troy.PilotFramework when a new DataUnit is created based on a troy.DataUnitDescription.

The DataUnit object can be used by the application to keep track of DataUnits that are active. A DataUnit has state, can be queried and can be cancelled.

cancel()¶

Cancel the DU

wait()¶

Wait until DU enters a final state
